content: Hello, thanks for texting XYZ Home Services. How can I help you today? Are you in need of plumbing, electrical, or HVAC services?
I need a plumber. My sink is leaking and won't stop. Can someone come today?
I'm sorry to hear about your leaking sink. Before I can schedule a plumber, may I get your name, please?
Thank you, Margaret. Could you please provide your address so I can check that you're in our service area?
Thanks! One last thing—when would be the best time today for our plumber to come by?
As soon as possible, please. I'm worried it's going to flood my kitchen.
Thank you, Margaret. I'm checking our calendar for the soonest available plumber for you.
I'm having trouble accessing our scheduling system right now. Let me get a specialist to assist you immediately. Please hold on.
reason: Unable to check calendar - escalation to human required.

content: Hi Margaret, this is Edgar from XYZ Home Services. Sorry about the wait—I'll get you scheduled with a plumber as soon as possible. Can you confirm if you need urgent assistance this morning, or is this afternoon okay?
Morning if you can, please! My floor is already soaked.

Understood. I’ve put your job in as high priority and our next available plumber will head your way within the next hour. You’ll get a confirmation text and estimated arrival shortly. Please try to turn off your water supply if you’re able. If anything changes, reply here.
reason: Operator scheduled urgent plumbing job following AI calendar failure.
